subject: Re: svn commit: samba r22412 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/utils: .
body:
On Fri, Apr 20, 2007 at 10:05:51AM -0400, simo wrote:
> On Fri, 2007-04-20 at 15:23 +0200, Michael Adam wrote:
> > On Fri, Apr 20, 2007 at 09:14:54AM -0400, simo wrote:
> > > Please update the net man page as well.
> > 
> > this has already been done by Karolin in samba-docs r1101.
> 
> Cool,
> sorry, didn't notice.

The nasty bit was that the manpage was checked in
before the code... ;-)

Michael
